title: Labour has now run out of excuses. It can’t delay a general election any longer
text:
You can’t live a lie forever – not even if you’re a politician. In the end, the dissonance becomes unbearable. You can spin, you can massage figures, you can put your behaviour in the best possible light. But there comes a moment when the distance between what you say and what you know becomes too vast to be contained in any human breast.

That is the point Labour MPs are reaching now. And that is why they will, I think, accept the inevitability of a general election. Not just because their supporters demand one. Not just because their past calls for an immediate dissolution are ringing in their ears. Not just because every delay causes them to slide further in the polls. But because, deep down,...
description: You can’t live a lie forever – not even if you’re a politician.
